verbs.description: Government workers [V: are] taking President Donald Trump to court over an executive order limiting the amount of time public employees can spend on union activities .

[ARG0: Government workers] are [V: taking] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: to court] [ARGM-CAU: over an executive order limiting the amount of time public employees can spend on union activities] .
Government workers are taking President Donald Trump to court over [ARG0: an executive order] [V: limiting] [ARG1: the amount of time public employees can spend on union activities] .
Government workers are taking President Donald Trump to court over an executive order limiting the amount of time public employees [V: can] spend on union activities .

Government workers are taking President Donald Trump to court over an executive order limiting [ARG1: the amount of time] [ARG0: public employees] [ARGM-MOD: can] [V: spend] [ARG3: on union activities] .
